data.name: PaintEvent
desc: specifies the paint event for a component.
This event is a special type which is used to ensure that paint/update method calls are serialized along with the other events delivered from the event queue.

items.name: Count
lines: contains the number of paint events that follows this event if it is a multiple PaintEvent.
You can collect the PaintEvent until Count is zero.

items.name: UpdateRect
lines: contains the rectangle area which needs to be repainted.
